definition: carrying pole and the loads on it/burden/task/responsibility/CL:副[fu4]
picul (100 catties, 50 kg)/two buckets full/carrying pole and its load/classifier for loads carried on a shoulder pole
to undertake/to carry/to shoulder/to take responsibility
(noun suffix)

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: Club-shaped hyphae in the hymenial layer of certain basidiomycete fungi are also termed paraphyses.
sentences.chinese: 某些擔子菌的子實層中的棒狀菌絲也稱爲側絲。

sentences.english: The burden on likes is cheerfully borne.
sentences.chinese: 愛挑的擔子，就愉快輕鬆。

sentences.english: For every man shall bear his own burden.
sentences.chinese: 因爲各人總要挑他自己的擔子。

sentences.english: Basidium (pl. basidia) The cell of the BASIDIOMYCOTA that produces the sexual spores (basidiospores).
sentences.chinese: 擔子菌產生的有性孢子。

sentences.english: Aversion phenomena are shown by fungi other than basidiomycetes.
sentences.chinese: 排斥現象除擔子菌外也曾由其它真菌證實過。

sentences.english: Smuts Plant diseases caused by basidiomycete fungi of the order Ustilaginales.
sentences.chinese: 是一種由於擔子菌綱黑粉菌目的真菌引起的植物疾病。

sentences.english: It's nothing for a member of the Iron Girls' Team to shoulder a load of 100 jin.
sentences.chinese: 鐵姑娘隊的隊員挑百斤重的擔子毫不在乎。

sentences.english: The heavy burden has brayed him.
sentences.chinese: 沉重的擔子把他壓垮了。

sentences.english: He shouldered the loaded carrying pole and walked off with a swing.
sentences.chinese: 他挑起擔子顫悠顫悠地走了。

sentences.english: Dissolution of primary wall appears at the neck of sterigma.
sentences.chinese: 擔孢子與擔子的小梗連接處出現初生壁溶化現象。

sentences.english: Do you try and move the some of the burden of testing back onto developers?
sentences.chinese: 你是否嘗試去把一些測試的擔子轉移給開發人員呢？

sentences.english: I pulled an extra shift, you are on Sam duty.
sentences.chinese: 我挑了一個大擔子，你的職責就是照顧薩姆。

sentences.english: So Ben butchers in the past rely on the straw heap below, pick up the butcher's knife lay down their burden.
sentences.chinese: 屠戶於是奔過去倚靠在柴草堆下，放下擔子拿起屠刀。

sentences.english: In this paper were briefly discussed fundamental conception of species of Higher Basidiomycetes.
sentences.chinese: 本文扼要地討論了高等擔子菌種的基本概念。

sentences.english: There are also some estimates of the efficiency of litter decomposition by Basidiomycetes in pure culture.
sentences.chinese: 也有一些關於純培養擔子菌分解落葉層效力的估計。

sentences.english: The greatest burden is on the Bank of Japan.
sentences.chinese: 最重的擔子壓在了日本銀行身上。

definition: heavy burden/difficult task/great responsibility
to toil/hard work
to bind/to yoke/to impede
strength/energy/vigor/talent
many/diverse
chains/shackles
to bear/to carry on one's back/to shoulder
to shoulder (a burden)/to bear/to suffer (a disadvantage)
to worry/to fret/to be anxious/to become sad
labor/able-bodied worker/laborer/work force
to support a family/to raise a family
burden
to implicate/to involve
to suffer untold hardships (idiom); trials and tribulations/with difficulty/after some effort
not knowing which course to follow (idiom); at a loss what to do
to eke out a living/to live from hand to mouth/to drift aimlessly
to take care of/to raise money/to attend to (guests, customers etc)
